contest-event.event-date: Feb. 3, 2019 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Lubetkin Theatre, East Durham College, Peterlee Best 2nd Section Band: North Skelton Winning Conductor: North Skelton Best Percussion: North Skelton Best Principal Cornet: Cockerton Best Soprano Cornet: GT Group Peterlee Feb. 3, 2019, 10:54 p.m. Feb. 3, 2019, 11 p.m. 1 North Skelton Band Lewis Wilkinson The Saga of Haakon the Good 2 Durham Miners Association Stuart Gray Rise of the Phoenix 3 Cockerton Prize Silver Band Andrew Hunter Variations on Maccabeus 4 GT Group Peterlee Ian Langthorne Symphony of Marches 5 Ferryhill Town Gareth Sykes Toccata Festiva
